attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Changing the name of Merseyside to Greater Liverpool would increase the area's prestige, particularly overseas where people recognise the name "Liverpool," but not the nebulous term "Merseyside," which is not even factually correct (it includes part of the Wirral peninsular overlooking the River Dee, and areas upto Southport facing Liverpool Bay, and yet the River Mersey also extends beyond Manchester).
The use of the term "Merseyside" tends to diminish the prestige of Liverpool compared with that of Manchester whose name is retained in the term "Greater Manchester".
